revised_title: Observations on the Shining and Movement of Glow-Worms
tldr: John Templer conducts experiments on glow-worms, observing their shining and movement patterns. He discovers that the glow-worm's shining is affected by its position and environment, and that it may not shine when still. Templer also notes the difference in color and intensity of the glow-worm's light under various conditions.
